statements: SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_category = 'Work';
SELECT task_name, task_category, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY completed_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_category, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC, completed_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_category = 'Important' AND task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_category FROM tasks WHERE completed_date >= '2021-01-01' AND completed_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY completed_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_category IN ('Work', 'Personal') AND task_status <> 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, start_date FROM tasks WHERE completed_date IS NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM task_performance WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, start_date, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT task_name, execution_time, completion_status FROM tasks JOIN task_performance ON tasks.task_id = task_performance.task_id;
SELECT task_name, start_date, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE completed_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_priority FROM tasks WHERE task_priority > 3;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM task_logs;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_priority > 3;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_priority, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_priority DESC, task_name ASC;
SELECT t.task_name, tp.start_time, tp.end_time FROM tasks t JOIN task_performance tp ON t.task_id = tp.task_id;
SELECT t.task_name, tl.log_message, tl.log_timestamp FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN task_logs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks_completed;
SELECT task_id, task_name, completed_date FROM tasks_completed WHERE completion_time > 5;
SELECT task_name, completed_date FROM tasks_completed ORDER BY completed_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks_completed WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM task_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT task_name, completed_date FROM tasks_completed ORDER BY completed_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM task_performance WHERE execution_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM tasks_completed FULL OUTER JOIN task_metrics ON tasks_completed.task_id = task_metrics.task_id;
SELECT task_name, report_content FROM tasks_completed JOIN task_reports ON tasks_completed.task_id = task_reports.task_id WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, execution_time FROM tasks_completed RIGHT JOIN task_performance ON tasks_completed.task_id = task_performance.task_id ORDER BY execution_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT task_description, completed_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed'
SELECT * FROM performance_analysis WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY completed_date DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT task_name, performance_score AS score FROM tasks JOIN performance_analysis ON tasks.task_id = performance_analysis.task_id WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT department_name, employee_name FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.manager_id = employees.employee_id ORDER BY department_name ASC;
